entry.title: sql test
entry.content:
创建测试表

``` CREATE TABLE "ZXD0"."ZXD_TEST" (

"FNAME" VARCHAR2(20 BYTE),
"LNAME" VARCHAR2(20 BYTE),
"AGE"   VARCHAR2(20 BYTE),
"CITY"  VARCHAR2(20 BYTE)

) ```

数据集

```

select * from zxd_test;

FNAME LNAME AGE CITY

xudong zhao 25 hangzhou
qian he 25 hangzhou
qi chen 25 hangzhou
zhibing cheng 25 hangzhou
haidong xu 25 shanghai
xudong zhang 24 beijing
* 1.distinct 测试

select distinct age from zxd_test;

AGE

25
24

select distinct age,lname from zxd_test;

AGE LNAME

25 xu
25 zhao
25 he
25 chen
25 cheng
24 zhang
* 2.partition 测试

select nvl(sum(age) over (partition by city),0) as age_sum from zxd_test;

AGE_SUM

 24 
100 
100 
100 
100 
 25

select city,nvl(sum(age) over (partition by city),0) as age_sum from zxd_test;

CITY AGE_SUM

beijing 24 hangzhou 100 hangzhou 100 hangzhou 100 hangzhou 100 shanghai 25 ```
